statements: SELECT * FROM farm_to_table_product WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, production_stage FROM farm_to_table_product WHERE chef = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM farm_to_table_product ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, chef FROM farm_to_table_product WHERE seed_planting_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, harvest_date, chef FROM farm_to_table_product WHERE production_stage = 'Ready to Serve' ORDER BY chef DESC;
SELECT * FROM farm_to_table_product WHERE production_stage = 'Seedling' ORDER BY seed_planting_date DESC
SELECT product_name, chef FROM farm_to_table_product WHERE harvest_date > '2022-01-01' AND production_stage = 'Harvested'
SELECT chef, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM farm_to_table_product GROUP BY chef HAVING total_products > 2 ORDER BY total_products DESC
SELECT * FROM farm_to_table_product WHERE production_stage IN ('Seedling', 'Harvested') AND chef LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT product_name, harvest_date FROM farm_to_table_product WHERE production_stage = 'Harvested' ORDER BY harvest_date ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM seed;
SELECT seed_name FROM seed WHERE seed_type='Fruit';
SELECT seed_id, seed_name, seed_type FROM seed ORDER BY seed_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM seed WHERE seed_type='Flower' AND seed_name LIKE 'R%';
SELECT prod_id, seed_id, stage_name FROM production WHERE stage_name='Germination';
SELECT * FROM seed WHERE seed_type = 'Flower';
SELECT seed_name FROM seed ORDER BY seed_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_seeds FROM seed;
SELECT seed_name, seed_type FROM seed WHERE seed_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY seed_name LIMIT 5;
SELECT seed_id, seed_name, stage_name FROM seed INNER JOIN production ON seed.seed_id = production.seed_id WHERE stage_name = 'Germination';
SELECT * FROM product
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product
SELECT product_id, product_name, location_id FROM product
SELECT product_name, production_stage FROM product
SELECT * FROM location
SELECT * FROM product WHERE production_stage = 'Completed';
SELECT product_name, location_name FROM product JOIN location ON product.location_id = location.location_id;
SELECT product_name, stage_description FROM product JOIN production ON product.product_id = production.product_id WHERE production.stage_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM production WHERE stage_description LIKE '%quality%';
SELECT location_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM product GROUP BY location_name ORDER BY total_products DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Seed;
SELECT seed_name, seed_type, planting_date FROM Seed;
SELECT * FROM Seedling WHERE growth_stage = 'Sprouting' ORDER BY growth_date DESC;
SELECT seed_name, plant_id FROM Seed LEFT JOIN Plant ON Seed.seed_id = Plant.seedling_id;
SELECT plate_id, harvest_date, served_date FROM Plate ORDER BY served_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Seed;
SELECT seed_id, seed_name, seed_type FROM Seed WHERE seed_type='Flower' ORDER BY seed_name ASC;

SELECT s.seed_name, sl.growth_stage, p.harvest_date FROM Seed s JOIN Seedling sl ON s.seed_id = sl.seed_id JOIN Plant p ON sl.seedling_id = p.seedling_id WHERE p.harvest_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY p.harvest_date DESC;

SELECT s.seed_name, COUNT(pl.plate_id) AS plates_served FROM Seed s JOIN Seedling sl ON s.seed_id = sl.seed_id JOIN Plant p ON sl.seedling_id = p.seedling_id JOIN Plate pl ON p.plant_id = pl.plant_id GROUP BY s.seed_name HAVING COUNT(pl.plate_id) > 5;
SELECT seed_name, planting_date FROM Seed WHERE seed_type='Vegetable' AND planting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM seed;
SELECT seed_name, plant_type FROM seed ORDER BY plant_type DESC;
SELECT sapling_id, growth_stage FROM sapling WHERE height_cm > 50;
SELECT harvest_id, harvest_date FROM harvest WHERE weight_g < 1000;
SELECT plate_name, serving_size FROM plate WHERE serving_size BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM seed WHERE plant_type = 'Vegetable';
SELECT sapling_id, growth_stage, height_cm FROM sapling WHERE height_cm > 50 ORDER BY growth_stage DESC;
SELECT distribution_id, distributor_name, destination_address FROM distribution WHERE distributor_name LIKE '%Coop%' ORDER BY distribution_id;
SELECT harvest_date, weight_g FROM harvest WHERE weight_g BETWEEN 100 AND 500 AND harvest_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT plate_id, plate_name FROM plate WHERE serving_size >= 2 AND plate_name LIKE 'Dessert%' ORDER BY serving_size ASC;
